'''Polished blackstone stairs''' are a [[polished blackstone]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Polished blackstone stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Polished Blackstone Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Polished blackstone stairs generate as part of [[ruined portal]]s in [[the Nether]].
